name: Cross-Agent Workflows Test
description: Tests complex workflows that coordinate between email and calendar agents

parts.text: Check my emails for any meeting requests and schedule them on my calendar

args.reply_message: Thank you for sending the document. I'll review it and provide feedback. I've also scheduled a follow-up meeting for us next week to discuss the details in person.
